name: Evergreen
body:
![Evergreen](http://25.media.tumblr.com/f1b4a938a33523b30c9bb287a44311e5/tumblr_mjpl6zBSWf1s8zar3o1_1280.png)

Evergreen provides a digital currency supported by real assets. It is an alternative to
existing currencies in that it is globally accessible, provides a stable store of value, and
supports the global ecosystem. It will be the default currency of the rapidly growing
collaborative consumption and crowd funding communities.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
